short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Perform searches across multiple regions simultaneously

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open multiple Google search result pages for different locations and languages with one click.
Users can input a search term, choose one or multiple specific search regions, and click the search button. RegionSearcher will automatically open search result pages (SERPs) for the selected regions. If users select 'Translate Keywords for Regions,' RegionSearcher will first translate the query, using algorithms that consider the cultural customs, language, and user search habits of each region or country.

Features:

- Open Google search result pages for multiple countries and languages with one click.
- Automatically translate search content to include local culture and terminology while searching in multiple languages and regions.
